title: How do the Google Pixel 5 and OnePlus 8T compare? - Quora

response.answer_text: Comparing of both pixel 5 and Oneplus 8T is bad idea because specs of a both smartphones are not similar. Pixel 5 comes with midrange 5g chipset called snapdragon 765g and in other side OnePlus 8T comes with latest and greatest Snapdragon 865+. In design department both pixel 5 and Oneplus 8T looks similar but Oneplus 8T screen size (6.5 inch) is large as compared to 6 inch pixel 5 and display refreshment pixel 5 have 90 hz OLED pannel and Oneplus already confirms upcoming 8T will comes with 120 hz refresh rate display. In terms of camera Oneplus 8T comes with 4 rear cameras on the back with 48 mp main,16 mp ultrawide,5mp macro and 5mp depth enabled camera and pixel 5 have two rear cameras on the back with 12.2 mp main sensor and 16 mp ultrawide sensor.. probably OnePlus 8T comes with 32mp camera and in other side pixel 5 have just 8mp camera. OnePlus 8T comes first OnePlus smartphone with 65w fast charging support and you know pixel 5 have a just 18w fast charging.
